AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States of America: The country where the legal case is taking place, with its own set of laws and constitutional protections, including the prohibition on ex post facto laws
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Federal Grand Jury: Returned a five-count superseding indictment against Jose Marlon Ibarra-Zelaya and co-defendants for conspiracy and offenses stemming from an illegal alien smuggling venture, found that the government had proven beyond a reasonable doubt that Jose Marlon Ibarra-Zelaya and six co-defendants demanded a ransom in connection with the hostage-taking offenses charged in counts four and five
